basicInfo.name: Bane
basicInfo.flavor: Bane acquired his huge army of Undead through the Grimoire of the Dead. With the help of Kris, he hopes to take Dark Grave from Dellons.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Mana Blast
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 285% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 90% chance to inflict Silence. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 340% of Magic Attack.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Adds Effect: 100% chance to inflict 33% Physical Attack Reduction. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]

Skill 2.name: Magic Orb
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 120% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 65% chance to inflict Silence. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 145% of Magic Attack.

Passive.name: Overcoming Death
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Revives with Immortality upon falling in battle. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)] [Once per Battle]
 - Revives with Immortality upon falling in battle. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)] [Once per Battle]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Turns: Immortality duration becomes 3 turn(s).
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Adds Effect: 40% Effect Hit Rate Boost. [Always Active]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.story: Bane's new lich form never stopped him from continuing his research in magic. Through his studies, his magic became even stronger.

basicInfo.name: Bane
basicInfo.flavor: Relentlessly studying the power of the dead, the lich Bane created the Grimoire of the Dead. It is said that writing a person's name in the grimoire could turn them into an Undead.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Mana Blast
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 255% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 90% chance to inflict Silence. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 255% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Magic Orb
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 110% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 60% chance to inflict Silence. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 110% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Overcoming Death
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Revives with Immortality upon falling in battle. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)] [Once per Battle]

profile.story:
In the ancient times, there was a mad king who desired eternal life.
To grant his wish, he built a tower that opened a door to another dimension where death did not exist, and brought a great demon into this world.
The technology of the ancient kingdom was so advanced that it was able to contain this demon with ease, and the king tried to do everything in his power to learn the secret to immortality from the demon.
However, the demon wasn't the only one being watched.
As the technicians were studied the demon, the demon studied them back. Eventually, the demon was able to master the inner workings of the humans' magic and technology.
Once he was certain that he had learned all that the humans had to offer, he overloaded the magic within the cell that contained him, causing a gigantic explosion that set him free.
The fallout from that explosion contaminated the land, turning it into a realm of the undead.
The king had finally obtained the immortality that he wanted. But his immortality has become a curse chaining him to the mistakes he made in life — so now he seeks to end it.

Once he was certain that he had learned all that the humans had to offer, he overloaded the magic within the cell that contained him, causing a gigantic explosion that set him free.
